alert.note: Alert for Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 1:25PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Kenedy and north central Willacy Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Perlita, or 10 miles east of Raymondville, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Perlita, Yturria, San Perlita High School and Rudolph. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 752 and 762. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
